name: ＳＵＮＤＡＹ ＲＩＤＥ
description:
Sit back, relax, and try not to crash your lovely face into other motorbikes on this exciting but soothing ride of Sunday Ride.

Try to get as far as you can get with the limited amount of fuel of your two-wheeled companion.

Controls:
W - accelerate
S - brake
A, D - steering

This is a #LOWREZJam entry and if you liked this game (or not) you could rate it (or not) on the LOWREZJam itch.io page.

Game design, scripting: BottledMajesticness @majesthiccness
Music: Jamesy Downie @Jamesyknowsall
